017package org.microbean.loader.spi;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021
022import org.microbean.loader.api.Loader;
023
024import org.microbean.path.Path;
025
026import org.microbean.qualifier.Qualifiers;
027
028/**
029 * A skeletal {@link Provider} implementation.
030 *
031 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
032 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
033 *
034 * @see #lowerBound()
035 *
036 * @see Provider
037 */
038public abstract class AbstractProvider implements Provider {
039
040
041  /*
042   * Instance fields.
043   */
044
045
046  private final Type lowerBound;
047
048
049  /*
050   * Constructors.
051   */
052
053  
054  /**
055   * Creates a new {@link AbstractProvider} with {@code null} as its
056   * {@linkplain #lowerBound() lower type bound}.
057   *
058   * @see #AbstractProvider(Type)
059   *
060   * @see #lowerBound()
061   */
062  protected AbstractProvider() {
063    this(null);
064  }
065  
066  /**
067   * Creates a new {@link AbstractProvider}.
068   *
069   * @param lowerBound the {@linkplain #lowerBound() lower type bound}
070   * of this {@link AbstractProvider}; may be, and often is, {@code
071   * null}
072   *
073   * @see #lowerBound()
074   */
075  protected AbstractProvider(final Type lowerBound) {
076    super();
077    this.lowerBound = lowerBound;
078  }
079
080
081  /*
082   * Instance methods.
083   */
084
085
086  /**
087   * Returns a {@link Type} representing the <strong>lower bound of
088   * all possible {@linkplain Value values}</strong> {@linkplain
089   * #get(Loader, Path) supplied} by this {@link AbstractProvider}.
090   *
091   * @return the lower type bound of this {@link AbstractProvider}
092   * implementation, or {@code null} if its lower bound is the lowest
093   * possible bound
094   *
095   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
096   *
097   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
098   *
099   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
100   * threads.
101   */
102  @Override // Provider
103  public final Type lowerBound() {
104    return this.lowerBound;
105  }
106
107}
